name: Hercules V: Platinum Edition
summary: 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas follows Hercules on his fifth resourceful ride to save Greece! Ares, Greek god of war, asks Hercules to lead his armies. When Hercules refuses, Ares casts a curse over the children of Hellas. Can you craft your way through countless obstacles and save the kids in 12 Labours of Hercules V: Kids of Hellas?
